fields.label: Form URL
fields.name: formUrl
fields.description: The Tally.so embed URL (e.g., https://tally.so/embed/mOVYJa)

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: The title displayed above the form

fields.label: Subtitle
fields.name: subtitle
fields.description: The subtitle displayed below the title

fields.label: Hide Custom Title
fields.name: hideCustomTitle
fields.description: Hide the custom title that appears above the form

fields.label: Hide Custom Subtitle
fields.name: hideCustomSubtitle
fields.description: Hide the custom subtitle that appears below the title

fields.label: Container Size
fields.name: containerSize
fields.description: The size of the container that holds the form

fields.label: iFrame Height
fields.name: iframeHeight
fields.description: Height of the form iframe in pixels (default: 200). Only applies as a fallback if dynamic height fails.

fields.label: HTML Align Left
fields.name: htmlAlignLeft
fields.description: Align the title, subtitle, and form container to the left
